cli_content:
IP Address      MAC Address     Interface    Port        Type
192.168.254.251 0000.cd37.06aa  vlan954      sa1         dynamic
192.168.254.250 0000.cd37.06bb  vlan954      sa1         dynamic
textfsm_template:
Value Required IP_ADDRESS (\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+)
Value Required MAC_ADDRESS (\S+)
Value TYPE (\S+)
Value INTERFACE (\S+)
Value PORT (\S+)

Start
  ^.*IP\s+Address\s+MAC\s+Address\s+Interface\s+Port\s+Type
  ^.*IP\s+Address\s+LL\s+Address\s+Interface\s+Port\s+Type
  ^${IP_ADDRESS}\s+${MAC_ADDRESS}\s+${INTERFACE}\s+${PORT}\s+${TYPE} -> Record
  ^. -> Error
